annotations:
FM: EDOLENA SHIPPING LTD
AT:  SALE & PURCHASE
For sale below tankers come with excellent DD/SS position and CAP 1 –
Endo Levante will be delivered with BWTS installed whereas Endo Sirocco is without.   Both vessels are accessible for inspections with short notice.
m/t ENDO LEVANTE
UK Flag,  BV Class D.Hull Oil Tanker – CAP 1
DD Aug 2025 / SS Aug 2027
1997 Blt – UK ( VSEL – Barrow )
4,765dwt on 6.03m
5,013 cbm ( 98% ) – 5 segr.
91.4m LOA   15.52m Beam
Epoxy Coated / Coiled
10x175cbm/h FRAMO + 2x90cbm/h FRAMO Cgo Pumps
1 x M/E MAN/BW 2300KW
3 x AUX & Shaft Gen
Bow-Thruster & Controllable Pitch Prop.
&
m/t ENDO SIROCCO
Cyprus Flag, BV Class D.Hull Oil Tanker – CAP 1
DD Feb 2025 / SS Aug 2027
1997 Blt – China (Qiu Xin Shipyard, Shanghai)
4,967dwt on 6.20m
4,857cbm (98%) – 6 segr.
91.0m LOA  15.60m Beam
Epoxy Coated / Coiled
10 x 300cbm/h + 2 x 200cbm/h Centrifugal Cgo Pumps
1 x M/E MAN 6M32
3 x Aux (Caterpillar 3850B)
Bowthruster & Controllable Pitch Prop.
ada – wog
Looking fwrd to hearing from interested parties when we may guide further.
Please copy in reply to shipbroker@edolena.eu  for faster feedback.
Regards,
Edolena Shipping Ltd. (ESL)
Sale & Purchase and Chartering
shipbroker@edolena.eu
www.edolena.com
